name: IndianStatesQuizGame
0:
”Alexa, open Indian States Quiz”
”Alexa, play Indian States Quiz”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: indian states quiz
des:
You can ask Indian states and union territories of their capitals,statecode,statehood year,statehood order or you can ask to start a quiz.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Indian States Quiz" or "Alexa, open Indian States Quiz" to start the game".

At anytime, you can stop the game by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
